trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Thunder Bay
There were no other sightings in Thunder Bay on or around December 19th 2007
divs: Sighting DetailsOk at about 1:00 pm i was walking in constance lake first nation then some kind of upsidedown bowl landed in the saw dust.It hurted my eyes when i looked at it then i fell to the ground then it shifted its stands on the bottom then it took off.It looked like flashing lights then as soon as i blinked it was gone.I was scared it would take me so i jumped into a ditch then watched it from there.
Summary: It looked like an upside down bowl
